data.title: Wikiwand / articles
data.meta_description: Sandy Lam,, is a Hong Kong singer, actress and record producer. She sings in Cantonese, Mandarin, English, and Japanese.
data.text:
Sandy Lam, (Chinese: 林憶蓮), is a Hong Kong singer, actress and record producer. She sings in Cantonese, Mandarin, English, and Japanese.

This is a Chinese name; the family name is Lam.

Quick Facts Born, Occupation(s) ...

Close

Sandy joined Hunan Television's show Singer 2017 in January 2017 and she won 1st place in the final (episode 13).
